title: 413 6 "A Difficult Fight for Luffy! The Snake Sisters' Haki Power!!"Transliteration: "Rufi Daikusen! Hebi Shimai no Haki no Chikara!!" (Japanese:ルフィ第苦戦! ヘビ姉妹の覇気の力!!) Sumio Watanabe Hitoshi Tanaka August 16, 2009(2009-08-16)[15]
transformers_text: 413 6 A Difficult Fight for Luffy The Snake Sisters ' Hak i Power Transliteration Ru fi D aik use n He bi Shima i no Hak i no Chikara Japanese Sumi o Watanabe Hitoshi Tanaka August 16 2009 2009 08 16 15 Luffy gets the petrified Margaret and her friends to safety and then fights against Sanderson i a and Marigold but struggles against their Devil Fruit powers and their ability to predict his moves with Hak i When Sanderson i a plans on breaking the petrified Marguerite in order to cause Luffy pain he screams for her to stop forcing her to stop and causing many of the assembled warriors to faint by using a special and rare kind of Hak i Hancock identifies as a Conqueror's Spirit With Margaret safe Luffy prepares to fight at full power
